about_the_game:
BanHown is a life simulation game in which assume the role of a person who must migrate to other provinces for subsistence farming, manage time and resources efficiently while immersing themselves in a Thai Ban style atmosphere.

Features

  • A variety of seeds can be purchased. Each store has its own unique items that can be bought and sold in different.

  • Players can plant seeds and take care of them by watering them until they mature. Once mature, the crops can be harvested and sold.

  • Players can immerse themselves in the natural atmosphere and observe creatures according to weather conditions on the survey maps.

  • Players can fish for leisure while waiting for crops to grow, either to sell for additional income or to find items in specific areas.

Plan for future updates

  • Add cooking feature
  • More types of vegetables that can be planted
  • Introduce a mission from a village NPC
  • More stories and NPC conversations
  • Add more equipment and facilities
  • Improve environmental details and introduce various buildings
  • Introduce dangerous animals in the area
  • Character's dexterity in the game

short_description: There was a widespread epidemic crisis, causing utilities and industry to halt, resulting in famine until the city became uninhabited. This forced people to rely on themselves for survival. However there is a family area coming and have decided to return to live in other provinces.
